learning-expedition-definition.title: Learning Expedition: Definition, Objectives and Real Impact for Schools and Companies
learning-expedition-definition.excerpt: Learning Expeditions have become a key format in schools and organizations. Discover what distinguishes this immersive format from other pedagogical approaches.
learning-expedition-definition.content: Learning Expeditions have become a key format in schools and organizations. We also talk about learning trips, learning excursions, learning journeys or even corporate travel. All these expressions refer to a central idea: moving to a new environment to learn. Unlike a classic seminar, a Learning Expedition does not aim to entertain or simply 'show' companies. It's a structured immersion, designed to trigger real change in how we think about organizations and offer encounters that no internal course or workshop can reproduce.

ai-summit-barcelona-story.title: AI Summit Barcelona: How an Embryonic Project Became One of Spain and Europe's Biggest AI Events
ai-summit-barcelona-story.excerpt: The story of AI Summit Barcelona's transformation, from a simple intuition in March 2025 to a major event gathering over a thousand participants.
ai-summit-barcelona-story.content: AI Summit Barcelona did not start as a grand international conference. It had no dedicated team, few resources, almost no structured program, and just a few dozen tickets sold. Yet, in just a few months, this still-vague project became a major event bringing together over a thousand participants, nearly a hundred international speakers, and positioned itself as one of the must-attend events in the European AI ecosystem.

lexintown-rusker-transformation.title: The Lexintown Transformation: How an Event Brand Revealed Rusker's New Identity
lexintown-rusker-transformation.excerpt: Brands don't transform overnight. Discover how Rusker and Lexintown evolved and merged to create a unified identity.
lexintown-rusker-transformation.content: Brands don't transform overnight. They evolve with their market, their audience, their mission, and sometimes through events that reveal things. This is exactly what happened between Rusker and Lexintown. Originally, these two brands had been designed to meet two different needs. Rusker for student formats and Learning Expedition programs. Lexintown for corporate formats and companies seeking professional immersion in Barcelona.

rusker-360-agency.title: Rusker: Travel, Events, Network. A 360° Agency Rooted in Barcelona's Ecosystem
rusker-360-agency.excerpt: Barcelona attracts thousands of students, talents, companies and leadership teams every year. Discover how Rusker structures its 360° approach.
rusker-360-agency.content: Barcelona attracts thousands of students, talents, companies and leadership teams every year seeking inspiration, training, innovation and professional encounters. To meet this multifaceted demand, Rusker has gradually structured its offering around a clear vision: to become an agency built around three complementary expertises that transform the city into a true laboratory of experiences, exploration and connections.

french-tech-barcelona-ecosystem.title: French Tech Barcelona, TalentBoard & Rusker Network: Building the Bridges the Ecosystem Was Missing
french-tech-barcelona-ecosystem.excerpt: Barcelona's tech ecosystem has exploded in visibility in recent years. But an ecosystem is more than just companies. It requires connections.
french-tech-barcelona-ecosystem.content: Barcelona's tech ecosystem has exploded in visibility in recent years. Startups, scale-ups, innovation hubs, investors, international schools... everything converges in a city that attracts talent, projects and capital from around the world. But an ecosystem is not just about companies. It needs connections. It needs the ability to link: schools and companies, talent and opportunities, local organizations and international visitors.

case-study-essec.title: CASE STUDY — ESSEC Leading a Scale-Up Chair
case-study-essec.excerpt: Diving into Barcelona's scale-ups to understand the true leadership of scaling in April 2025.
case-study-essec.content: In April 2025, students from ESSEC's Leading a Scale-Up Chair experienced something unique: four days at the heart of Barcelona's tech ecosystem. The objective? To go beyond theoretical models and understand how European scale-ups grow, organize, finance themselves and structure their leadership during hypergrowth.

case-study-escen.title: CASE STUDY - ESCEN x Rusker
case-study-escen.excerpt: Digital marketing & e-commerce immersion in Barcelona: understand, observe, inspire.
case-study-escen.content: In 2025, ESCEN — the Nextep group's business school — approached Rusker to design a one-month Learning Expedition in Barcelona. The students, from Lyon and elsewhere, were enrolled at Pompeu Fabra University campus for academic courses... but the objective was also to confront them with the reality of the field, in one of Europe's most dynamic marketing ecosystems.

case-study-wesharetrust-shoptalk.title: CASE STUDY - WeshareTrust x Shoptalk Europe 2025
case-study-wesharetrust-shoptalk.excerpt: Creating a premium side event for retail & retail media leaders in Barcelona.
case-study-wesharetrust-shoptalk.content: In early June 2025, Shoptalk Europe — one of the world's largest events dedicated to the future of retail — was held in Barcelona. The city welcomed thousands of international decision-makers exploring new trends: AI, unified commerce, retail media, customer experience, new business models, and technological innovations.

barcelona-tech-ecosystem.title: Barcelona: One of Europe's Most Dynamic Tech Ecosystems
barcelona-tech-ecosystem.excerpt: When thinking about Barcelona from Paris, one often imagines the beach, Gaudí, gastronomy. But behind this image lies one of Europe's most powerful tech ecosystems.
barcelona-tech-ecosystem.content: When thinking about Barcelona from Paris, one often imagines the beach, Gaudí, gastronomy, a certain enviable quality of life. But behind this postcard image lies one of Europe's most powerful and cohesive tech ecosystems — and above all, one of the most open.
